item.title: Beogram 4002 AC Motor Restoration
item.description:
I recently obtained an AC platter motor from a Beogram 4002 turntable to refurbish. Here’s what the motor looked like initially: After taking off the pulley, I drilled out the rivets to disassemble the motor and take out the rotor and coil carriers: Next, I submerged the motor housing parts in motor oil and created a vacuum: This caused bubbling as air escaped from the assembly. The bubbling stopped after 24 hours, at which point I cleaned the parts and reassembled the motor...
